sentences.en: a leakage of toxic waste into the sea
A new centre for research on toxic waste was inaugurated today at Imperial College.
sentences.cn: 新建的有毒废物研究中心今天在皇家学院举行落成典礼。

sentences.en: fumes from a toxic waste dump
sentences.cn: 有毒废料堆产生的毒气

sentences.en: In particular, there were numerous " toxic hotspots " which needed more stringent controls.
sentences.cn: 特别是, 有无数的 “ 有毒的潜在危险区 ” 需要更严厉的控制.

sentences.en: Lead can accumulate in the body until toxic levels are reached.
sentences.cn: 铅会在体内积聚直至造成铅中毒。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons plants across the country are heavily contaminated with toxic wastes.
sentences.cn: 全国的核武器工厂均受到了有毒废弃物的严重污染。

sentences.en: Of special concern are toxic contaminants in water from underground sources.
sentences.cn: 特别关心的是地下水源中的有毒污染物.

sentences.en: Section 301 ( b ) ( 2 ) prescribes BAT effluent limitations for " nonconventional " and toxic pollutants.
sentences.cn: 第201条 ( b ) ( 2 ) 中,针对 “ 非常规 ” 和有毒污染物规定了“最佳现有技术”污水限制.

sentences.en: The factory had accidentally released a quantity of toxic waste into the sea.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂意外泄漏大量有毒废物到海中.

sentences.en: Too much toxic waste is being dumped at sea.
sentences.cn: 太多的有毒废料在向大海里倾倒。

sentences.en: Toxic waste could endanger lives and poison fish.
sentences.cn: 有毒废物可能危及生命，毒死鱼类。

sentences.en: Toxicologists attempt to identify and understand toxic hazards.
sentences.cn: 毒理学家试图找出并了解毒害风险。

sentences.en: Two of the cases involving toxic water pollution are particularly interesting.
sentences.cn: 涉及到有毒水污染的两个案例特别令人感兴趣.

sentences.en: Unfortunately these drugs are quite toxic and hinder the body's ability to fight off infection.
sentences.cn: 可惜的是，这些药物毒性很大，会削弱身体对感染的抵抗力。

sentences.en: Up to 10 million tonnes of toxic wastes are produced every year in the UK.
sentences.cn: 英国每年会产生多达1,000万吨的有毒废弃物。

sentences.en: When spilled into the sea, oil can be toxic to marine plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 石油溢入海洋可能危害海洋生物.

words.tran_cn: [毒物] 毒物学，[毒物] 毒理学

phrases.tran_cn: 毒剂；有毒媒介；毒性药物
有毒化学品；有毒化学物质

trans.tran_cn: 有毒的，中毒的，因中毒引起的
trans.tran_en: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances
